document_data.title: Spells
document_data.author: [[William Tracy]], [[Christopher Mortika|Chris Mortika]], [[Grant Boucher]], and [[John Terra]]
document_data.Description: ''Dark and Hidden Ways'' was a booklet that was bundled with the ''[[Dungeoneer's Survival Guide]]'' as the "Limited Edition" of that sourcebook, mainly as a way to get rid of unsold stock. The first scenario, ''Drow Magic-User and Dracolich'', is set in [[Hooknose Crag]].
document_data.Credits:
* '''Authors:''' William Tracy, Chris Mortika, Grant Boucher, John Terra
* '''Cover Art:''' Daniel Horne
* '''Interior Art:''' Jim Holloway
